verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. Behold <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah rideth <S%H7392><s%> upon a swift <S%H7031><s%> cloud <S%H5645><s%>, and cometh <S%H935><s%> unto Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and the idols <S%H457><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall tremble <S%H5128><s%> at his presence <S%H6440><s%>; and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall melt <S%H4549><s%> in the midst of it <S%H7130><s%>.

And I will stir <S%H5526><s%> up the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> against the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; city <S%H5892><s%> against city <S%H5892><s%>, and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom <S%H4467><s%>.

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall fail <S%H1238><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of it <S%H1104><s%>; and I will destroy the counsel <S%H6098><s%> thereof <S%H1875><s%>: and they shall seek unto the idols <S%H457><s%>, and to the charmers <S%H328><s%>, and to them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, and to the wizards <S%H3049><s%>.

And <S%H853><s%> I will give over <S%H5534><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a cruel <S%H7186><s%> lord <S%H113><s%>; and a fierce <S%H5794><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over them <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H113><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall fail <S%H5405><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the river <S%H5104><s%> shall be wasted <S%H2717><s%> and become dry <S%H3001><s%>.

And the rivers <S%H5104><s%> shall become <S%H2186><s%> foul <S%H2186><s%>; the streams <S%H2975><s%> of Egypt <S%H4693><s%> shall be diminished <S%H1809><s%> and dried up <S%H2717><s%>; the reeds <S%H7070><s%> and flags <S%H5488><s%> shall wither away <S%H7060><s%>.

The meadows <S%H6169><s%> by the Nile <S%H2975><s%>, by the brink <S%H6310><s%> of the Nile <S%H2975><s%>, and all the sown <S%H4218><s%> fields of the Nile <S%H2975><s%>, shall become dry <S%H3001><s%>, be driven away <S%H5086><s%>, and be no more.

And the fishers <S%H1771><s%> shall lament <S%H578><s%>, and all they that cast <S%H7993><s%> angle <S%H2443><s%> into the Nile <S%H2975><s%> shall mourn <S%H56><s%>, and they that spread <S%H6566><s%> nets <S%H4365><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall languish <S%H535><s%>.
Moreover they that work <S%H5647><s%> in combed <S%H8305><s%> flax <S%H6593><s%>, and they that weave <S%H707><s%> white cloth <S%H2355><s%>, shall be confounded <S%H954><s%>.
And the pillars <S%H8356><s%> of Egypt shall be broken <S%H1792><s%> in pieces <S%H6213><s%>; all they that work for hire <S%H7938><s%> shall be grieved <S%H99><s%> in soul <S%H5315><s%>.

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are utterly foolish <S%H191><s%>; the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wisest <S%H2450><s%> counsellors <S%H3289><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> is become brutish <S%H1197><s%>: how say <S%H559><s%> ye unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, I am the son <S%H1121><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>?

Where <S%H335><s%> then <S%H645><s%> are thy wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H5046><s%>? and let them tell thee now <S%H3045><s%>; and let them know what Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath purposed <S%H3289><s%> concerning Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are become fools <S%H2973><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Memphis <S%H5297><s%> are deceived <S%H5377><s%>; they have caused Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to go astray <S%H8582><s%>, that are the corner-stone <S%H6438><s%> of her tribes <S%H7626><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath mingled <S%H4537><s%> a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of perverseness <S%H5773><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her <S%H4714><s%>; and they have caused Egypt to go astray <S%H8582><s%> in every work <S%H4639><s%> thereof <S%H7910><s%>, as a drunken man staggereth <S%H8582><s%> in his vomit <S%H6892><s%>.
Neither shall there be for Egypt <S%H4714><s%> any work <S%H4639><s%>, which head <S%H7218><s%> or tail <S%H2180><s%>, palm-branch <S%H3712><s%> or rush <S%H100><s%>, may do <S%H6213><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> be like unto women <S%H802><s%>; and they shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> and fear <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the shaking <S%H8573><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, which he shaketh over them <S%H5130><s%>.

And the land <S%H127><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall become a terror <S%H2283><s%> unto Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; every one to whom mention <S%H2142><s%> is made thereof shall be afraid <S%H6342><s%>, because <S%H6440><s%> of the purpose <S%H6098><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, which he purposeth against it <S%H3289><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be five <S%H2568><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that speak <S%H1696><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and swear <S%H7650><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%> The city <S%H5892><s%> of destruction <S%H2041><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and a pillar <S%H4676><s%> at <S%H681><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And it shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a witness <S%H5707><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; for they shall cry <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of oppressors <S%H3905><s%>, and he will send <S%H7971><s%> them a saviour <S%H3467><s%>, and a defender <S%H7227><s%>, and he will deliver them <S%H5337><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>; yea <S%H5647><s%>, they shall worship with sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and oblation <S%H4503><s%>, and shall vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and shall perform it <S%H7999><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5062><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, smiting <S%H5062><s%> and healing <S%H7495><s%>; and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and he will be entreated <S%H6279><s%> of them <S%H7495><s%>, and will heal them.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be a highway <S%H4546><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> into Assyria <S%H804><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall worship <S%H5647><s%> with the Assyrians <S%H804><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall Israel <S%H3478><s%> be the third <S%H7992><s%> with Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and with Assyria <S%H804><s%>, a blessing <S%H1293><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>;

for that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Egypt <S%H4714><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, and Assyria <S%H804><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> mine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
